title: Define Project Scope and Requirements for PersonalizedAIHealthCoach
description: Gather and document comprehensive user stories, system requirements (including functional and non-functional), success metrics, design specifications, and edge cases for the AI health coach. This task will serve as a basis for further development tasks and ensure alignment with project objectives. Collaborate with team members to refine these details where necessary.

title: Design AI Health Coach Architecture
description: Create an overview of the system architecture, including frontend, backend, and database components.

title: Develop User Interface (Frontend)
description: Design and implement the user interface for data collection, user interaction, and visualization of health metrics.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Create the backend services to process user data, interact with the AI model, and manage application logic.

title: Set Up Database and Storage
description: Configure the database schema, storage solutions for user data, and integration with the backend services.

title: Develop AI Model for Personalized Advice
description: Train and integrate an AI model to analyze user health metrics and provide personalized advice.

title: Integrate API Services and Authentication
description: Create APIs for data exchange between frontend, backend, and external services, as well as implement user authentication.

title: Test and Validate Functionality
description: Conduct functional testing to ensure the system works as intended, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.
dependencies: Develop AI Model for Personalized Advice

title: Review Code Quality and Security
description: Perform code reviews to ensure quality, adherence to coding standards, and security best practices.
dependencies: Develop AI Model for Personalized Advice

title: Document System Architecture, Design Decisions, and API Usage
description: Create technical documentation detailing the system architecture, design decisions, and API usage for future reference.
dependencies: Develop AI Model for Personalized Advice
